name: codeceptjs-docker
description: End to end tests for WordPress using CodeceptJS

scripts.stop-containers: docker stop selenium codeceptjs || true && docker rm selenium codeceptjs || true
scripts.codeceptjs-docker: docker run --name codeceptjs -h codeceptjs --link dockerhub:dockerhub --net codeceptjs-docker-tutorial_default -v $(pwd):/tests -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -e NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu -e profile=normal nexus.booxdev.com:8443/codeceptjs:v1.0.0
scripts.local-docker: npm run stop-containers && npm run codeceptjs-docker
